Title: Establishes the Medicaid identification and anti-fraud biometric technology pilot program; appropriation
Summary: Establishes the Medicaid identification and anti-fraud biometric technology pilot program; appropriates money therefor.
LawCode: Add Art 2-C §§295 - 298, Pub Health L; amd §367-b, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to establishing the Medicaid identification and anti-fraud biometric technology pilot program; and to amend the social services law, in relation to conforming medical assistance identification with the Medicaid identification and anti-fraud biometric technology program; and making an appropriation therefor
